title: Gratitude
verses: 1 Thessalonians 5:18 (WEB) — “In everything give thanks; for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus toward you.”
Psalm 136:1 (WEB) — “Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good; for his loving kindness endures forever.”
Colossians 3:17 (WEB) — “Whatever you do… do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through him.”
Philippians 4:6 (WEB) — “In everything, by prayer and petition with thanksgiving, let your requests be made known to God.”
body: Gratitude trains your heart to see God’s gifts in ordinary days. Give thanks in all circumstances—not for all things, but in all things—trusting the Father’s steady goodness.
prayer: Giver of every good gift, open my eyes to Your kindness today. Make thanksgiving my reflex and my witness. Amen.
